translation.en: NORBIT: Everyone has their path in life,
translation.zh: 每个人都有自己的生活道路

translation.en: and this is more or less where mine started.
translation.zh: 我的路差不多是这样开始的

translation.en: My name is Norbit Albert Rice, and I was an orphan.
translation.zh:
我叫诺比埃尔波莱斯
是个孤儿

translation.en: I like to think my parents loved me very much,
translation.zh: 我想象我父母非常爱我

translation.en: but just didn't have the means to properly care for me.
I can see them researching all of the orphanages in the area,
translation.zh:
我想象他们
到处找孤儿院安顿我

translation.en: agonizing over their choices,
trying to make sure their precious little boy
was raised in the perfect environment.
(BABY CRYING) ♪ In the safety zone ♪
Ling Ling! Someone left another one!
Oh, coyotes, go! Get! Back! Back, coyotes!
Get out here! Shoo! You not eat another baby.
translation.zh: 滚开！嘘！你不能再吃小孩子了

translation.en: Oh, crap. Another black one.
Can't give these away.
Ooh! You ugly black one, too. You be here long time.
translation.zh:
而且奇丑无比
你肯定能在这儿住很久

translation.en: Nobody ever come and say, "Give me the ugly, black one."
You very ugly baby. The ugliest baby I ever seen.
translation.zh: 丑娃娃！没见过这种丑八怪

translation.en: NORBIT: A lot of people think that orphanages are cold and scary,
translation.zh: 许多人以为孤儿院阴森可怕

translation.en: but the Golden Wonton was a great place to grow up.
translation.zh:
但是黄金馄饨馆
是个成长的好地方

translation.en: We had everything normal children had.
translation.zh:
我们有普通孩子
所拥有的一切

translation.en: -Pets... -(QUACKING)
-Here. -(CLEAVER BANGING) Play with that.
NORBIT: A big backyard, and lots of kids to play with.
translation.zh: 大大的后院 很多小孩一起玩

translation.en: Ling Ling! The children got in MSG barrel.
translation.zh: 玲玲 这小孩掉进味精桶了

translation.en: Now all their hair gonna fall out again.
translation.zh: 这下他的头发肯定全掉光

translation.en: You stupid orphan! Nobody want a bald orphan!
Norbit, how you find family with no hair?
translation.zh:
诺比！没头发
怎么找人家领养你？

translation.en: Nobody want a bald Norbit!
What the hell wrong with the children here?
NORBIT: Mr. Wong was a very interesting man.
translation.zh: 王伯是个非常有意思的人

translation.en: In addition to his love for children and preparation of fine Asian cuisine,
translation.zh:
他不光爱小孩
给大家烹煮亚洲美味佳肴

translation.en: he had a real passion for old-time whaling.
It's a whale, ho!
Die, you son-of-a...
Bingo! Right in the blow hole!
MR WONG: Norbit, where you go? Why you run off like little bitch?
translation.zh:
诺比！你上哪儿去？
怎么像个胆小鬼？

translation.en: NORBIT: After Marvin Browning got lost downtown for a couple of weeks,
the orphanage started using a buddy system.
translation.zh: 孤儿院启用了搭伙制度

translation.en: KATE: Go, Norbit!
NORBIT: My buddy was little Kate.
Go, Norbit! Go, Norbit! (YELLS)
That's okay. You're doing good.
Kate and I were always together. Playing checkers...
translation.zh: 凯特和我总是在一起 一起下棋

translation.en: Oh, man. Yes!
Watching scary movies.
Why, we even pooped together.
And then one day, Kate and I decided that we should tie the knot.
translation.zh: 有一天 凯特和我决定结婚

translation.en: We got married under the great big oak tree.
I now pronounce you my wife.
translation.zh: 现在我宣布你为我的太太

translation.en: And I pronounce you my husband.
It's watermelon.
Yours is green apple.
I think it's time for us to kiss now.
And we lived happily ever after...
translation.zh: 然后我们一起快乐生活

translation.en: For about two weeks until she got adopted.
translation.zh:
只有两个星期
然后她被一家人领养

translation.en: Bye, Norbit.
I didn't do too much bike-riding after that.
translation.zh: 此后 我不怎么骑脚踏车了

translation.en: When Kate left, there was an odd number of kids at the orphanage,
translation.zh:
凯特走后
孤儿院的小孩变成单数

translation.en: so I was buddyless for a while.
translation.zh: 于是我有一阵子没朋友

translation.en: And sometimes I'd get a little sad,
but I never lost hope.
translation.zh: 但我从来没有放弃希望

translation.en: I knew that someday I'd find another somebody to share my life with.
translation.zh:
我知道有一天
我会找到另一个人分享生活

translation.en: All I had to do was just be patient.
What'd you do that for? TWIN 1: Because we felt like it.
BOTH: What are you gonna do about it?
Loser.
(GRUNTING)
Leave him alone.
BOTH: Says who?
Who are you? Rasputia. What's your name?
translation.zh:
-你是谁？
-我叫拉斯普塔 你呢？

translation.en: Norbit. (CHUCKLES) Norbit? That's a stupid name.
Why'd you beat those boys up? To protect you.
translation.zh:
-你干吗打那两个男孩子？
-保护你啊

translation.en: You got a girlfriend, Nesbit? Uh, Norbit.
translation.zh:
-你有女朋友吗 乃斯比？
-我叫诺比

translation.en: (CLICKS TONGUE) No.
Well, you do now. Get your ass up and hold my hand.
translation.zh: 你现在有了 起来跟我拉手

translation.en: Okay. How you doing? (NORBIT SCREAMS)
NORBIT: Everything changed once I had Rasputia as my girlfriend.
translation.zh:
自从有了拉斯普塔
我的生活彻底变样

translation.en: We took care of each other...
And the other kids started to respect me.
translation.zh: 其他小孩开始尊敬我了

translation.en: I'll take...
Norbit. (ALL GROANING) Come on.
And because of Rasputia, for the first time in my life,
translation.zh: 因为拉斯普塔 今生头一回

translation.en: I had a real family.
Rasputia had three brothers.
Big Black Jack. He was the oldest.
Leg.
Then, there was Blue.
Breasts.
And Earl. He was the baby.
Wing.
They sure loved their little sister,
and so they treated me like one of their own.
translation.zh: 所以 他们也把我当亲人

translation.en: Here you go, Norbit. Saved the best piece for you.
translation.zh: 给你 诺比 我给你留了一块好肉

translation.en: What's that?
BIG JACK: Turkey ass. Eat up, sucker.
translation.zh: 火鸡屁股 吃吧 傻子

translation.en: Bon appetitty.
Bon appetitty.
The Latimores had a reputation
for being the meanest, nastiest people in town,
but that's just because folks didn't know 'em.
translation.zh: 只是因为大家不了解他们

translation.en: They were actually very nice, hard-working people.
translation.zh: 他们其实人很好 很勤劳 （理发店）

translation.en: They ran the local construction company,
and recently, responding to the needs of the community...
translation.zh: 最近 应本社区的需要

translation.en: Yo, Morris.
Had opened a little security business.
It was a surprisingly popular service among the local vendors.
(ITALIAN ACCENT) Hey, you don't shake me down. I'm Italian. I shake you down.
translation.zh:
你别想坑我 我是意大利人
我坑你才对

translation.en: Is that right? Yes.
Get his ass in here.
I'm in.
As time passed, Rasputia and I got closer and closer...
translation.zh: 渐渐地 我和拉斯普塔越走越近

translation.en: In high school
and as adults.
translation.zh: 我们长大后也是 （拉提莫砂砾）

translation.en: I started working as a bookkeeper in her family's business.
translation.zh: 我在她家的公司当簿记员

translation.en: I'm expecting some important calls today, Norbit,
translation.zh: 诺比 我今天有重要电话进来

translation.en: so when you answer the phone, try and sound white.
translation.zh: 你听电话时 拿出点白人腔调

translation.en: It was like everything was finally coming together.
translation.zh: 我觉得好像越来越顺利

translation.en: Yes.
Of course, it was only natural that Rasputia and I
would take the next step in our relationship.
translation.zh: 拉斯普塔和我将步入结婚礼堂

translation.en: MINISTER: I now pronounce you man and wife.
translation.zh: 我现在宣布你们为夫妻

translation.en: You may kiss the bride.
(GRUNTS) Open your mouth.
Go, Rasputia!
(SINGING) NORBIT: It was a storybook wedding,
translation.zh: 婚礼就像童话故事里一样

translation.en: the beginning of a brand-new chapter.
I knew I would never be lonely again.
translation.zh: 我知道我再也不会感到孤单

translation.en: I had found my place in the world.
translation.zh: 我找到了自己在世界上的位置

translation.en: Poor Norbit. Man.
Back when I was in the game, I used to tell my hos,
translation.zh:
我做那行时
曾告诉我手下的妓女

translation.en: "Hos, ain't no man gonna pay for the cow if he can get the milk for free."
translation.zh:
“你让他白喝奶
他肯定就不花钱买牛了”

translation.en: You ain't got to worry about this brother buying the milk,
translation.zh: 我们不必担心这位兄弟不买牛奶

translation.en: 'cause he just bought the whole damn cow.
translation.zh: 因为他刚刚买了一只大乳牛

translation.en: That's a special cow, too.
That must be where buttermilk come from.
MAN: Sing that shit, girl.
Them are not dimples. Them are potholes in her ass.
translation.zh: 那不是酒窝 是她的“后门”

translation.en: Look like an Escalade in a wedding dress.
translation.zh: 就像穿着婚纱的航空母舰

translation.en: It a horror show.
Norbit. What a woman you got.
translation.zh:
诺比
你的女人真与众不同

translation.en: Hi, fellows. We're all jealous, right, boys?
(ALL AGREEING) Oh, yeah. Way jealous. Wish I had one like that.
translation.zh:
-是啊
-我要是能娶到这样的老婆就好了

translation.en: Norbit, let me talk to you for a second.
translation.zh: 诺比 我有话对你说

translation.en: Look, just so we clear.
If you ever hurt my sister in any way,
make her cry, even make her sad one time,
translation.zh: 惹她哭 或是让她难过

translation.en: I'm coming at you with razor blades and lemon juice.
translation.zh: 我就会拿着刀片和柠檬汁来找你

translation.en: You hear me? Yes.
I'm talking pain, boy.
Searing, mind-numbing pain.
I understand.
You understand me? (CHOKING) Yes, yes, yes.
All right.
Welcome to the family. (WHIMPERING) Thank you.
Somebody is take a big hunk out of my cake!
translation.zh: 有人咬了一大口我的蛋糕

translation.en: What y'all looking at? I ain't had no cake.
translation.zh: 你们看什么？我又没吃蛋糕

translation.en: You better mind your damn business.
Hey, hey! Everyone!
I am Mr. Wong. I am best man in wedding.
translation.zh: 我是王先生 婚礼的伴郎

translation.en: I feel it my place to say something, uh, make a toast to bride and groom,
translation.zh:
我觉得应该讲两句话
为新郎新娘干杯

translation.en: tell story about Norbit. I like Norbit father.
translation.zh:
讲讲诺比的事
我就像诺比的老爸

translation.en: I raise Norbit. He like my own child.
translation.zh:
我养大了诺比
他就像我的亲儿子

translation.en: And I want to say that I very, very confused, Norbit,
translation.zh: 我想说 我觉得非常困惑

translation.en: that you... You marry Latimore.
translation.zh: 诺比 你娶了拉提莫小姐

translation.en: I don't understand it, because when you was a little boy, you say,
translation.zh: 我不明白 因为你小时候 说过

translation.en: "One day I find the girl of my dreams."
And then you marry a gorilla.
translation.zh: 可你这下却娶了个大猩猩

translation.en: I joke, I joke, I joke.
Why you not know joke when you hear joke?
Why you wanna make fight at wedding?
Cool off, before I have to bust somebody ass in here. Okay.
translation.zh:
冷静下来
要不我找一帮人来收拾你们

translation.en: When Norbit just little boy,
he like to always run all over place naked. Always naked.
translation.zh:
喜欢光着身子到处乱跑
什么都不穿

translation.en: And Norbit, when he was just little boy, had a pee-pee the size of an egg roll.
translation.zh:
诺比小时候
小鸡鸡大得像鸡蛋卷

translation.en: You know, Norbit. That's true.
MR. WONG: And one day, down by creek,
translation.zh: 有一天 诺比在小溪边乱跑

translation.en: Norbit run around naked
translation.zh:
有一天 诺比在小溪边乱跑 一条毒蛇跳起来
一口咬了他的屁股

translation.en: and poisonous snake jump up and bite Norbit right on ass.
translation.zh:
一条毒蛇跳起来
一口咬了他的屁股

translation.en: Very close to hole.
Norbit pass out. I think Norbit is dead.
I go to check the boy pulse. He still alive. He still alive!
translation.zh:
我以为他死了
我一摸他的脉搏 还活着

translation.en: "Okay," I say, "I must do something to save child."
translation.zh: 我说“我一定要想办法救孩子”

translation.en: So, I start to think,
"Do I suck poison out of Norbit's ass?" (WOMAN GIGGLING)
"Or do I let him die?"
I do the most responsible thing.
I say, "Hell to the no!
"Norbit is out of here,
"because it is long time in hell
"before Wong suck poison out of another man's ass."
But strange, mystical thing happen, Norbit.
translation.zh: 但是奇怪的事情发生了

translation.en: Even though poison is in Norbit, he not die.
translation.zh:
尽管诺比身上中毒
但他并没有死

translation.en: Norbit get stronger and stronger.
That why I know, Norbit, deep down inside, you very, very strong.
translation.zh: 那时我就知道 他是个壮汉子

translation.en: You strong like warrior.
That's why I say to you, Norbit, you can survive anything.
translation.zh:
所以我要对你说
诺比 你大难不死

translation.en: Even...
So I say to everyone here, and to Norbit,
translation.zh: 所以 我要对大家说 诺比

translation.en: I wish you much happiness and peace and love,
translation.zh: 我祝你幸福快乐 夫妻相爱

translation.en: and lots of bananas for your new gorilla.
translation.zh: 给你的大猩猩多吃香蕉

translation.en: (GASPS) I only kidding. To Norbit and Rasputia.
translation.zh: 我开玩笑的啦 为诺比和拉斯普塔干杯

translation.en: Oh, Norbit, you know what would be so romantic?
translation.zh: 诺比 你知道啥才叫浪漫？

translation.en: If you'd carry me over the threshold like a little chocolate drop.
translation.zh:
你抱我过门槛
就像抱颗小巧克力豆豆

translation.en: Be delicate, now.
Put your back into it.
Come on, now. Be a man.
translation.zh: 快点！拿出点男子汉气概

translation.en: You ain't no man.
Pathetic.
Rasputia, I know we're both nervous because we've never done this before,
translation.zh:
拉普斯塔 大家都紧张
我们从没做过

translation.en: but we can take our time, darling. (RUBBER SQUEAKING) In sweet time.
translation.zh:
但我们可以慢慢来
亲爱的 慢慢来

translation.en: NORBIT: Rasputia was so full of love.
translation.zh: 拉普斯塔对我充满爱意

translation.en: Merry Christmas!
Ho, ho, ho!
It was a love that sustained us through the years.
translation.zh:
这种爱让我们
度过许多美好时光

translation.en: Halt!
187. Officer down.
NORBIT: And it's still going strong.
translation.zh: 但我们的婚姻还是坚固牢靠

translation.en: Happy Presidents' Day!
God bless America.
And so, we began our life together,
translation.zh:
（现在） 我们开始了新生活
像所有幸福夫妻一样

translation.en: like any other happily married couple.
translation.zh:
我们开始了新生活
像所有幸福夫妻一样

translation.en: Morning, Rasputia.
(DOG BARKING) RASPUTIA: "Morning, Rasputia," my ass.
I tell you what. You better do something about that goddamn dog,
translation.zh: 你最好想办法收拾那只狗

translation.en: because I ain't gonna be getting terrorized by no dog on my own property.
translation.zh: 我才不要在自己家里… 被狗吓死

translation.en: I'm sick of it! I'm gonna go out and purchase me a pellet rifle!
translation.zh: 气死我了！我要去买一支气枪！

translation.en: And then I'm gonna give him something to bark about
translation.zh: 让它好好叫个够！ 狠狠给打它一枪

translation.en: when I start popping pellets in his little bug-eyed bastard's ass.
Messing around with you, now I'm gonna be late for dance class.
translation.zh:
不跟你聊了
我上舞蹈课要迟到了

translation.en: God damn it, Norbit. How many times I got to tell you,
translation.zh: 见鬼 跟你说过无数遍 开完我的车

translation.en: when you drive my car, don't adjust my seat!
translation.zh: 跟你说过无数遍 开完我的车 把座位给我调回去

translation.en: I haven't touched your seat. Then why is it up so damn far?
translation.zh:
-我没碰你的座位
-那座位咋那么靠前？

translation.en: It looks like it's back as far as it goes, Rasputia.
No, you moved it. I can tell, 'cause look, when I inhale,

translation.zh: 我能看出 我一呼吸 乳房按喇叭

translation.en: You see that?
That ain't right. (HORN BLARING) I hear it.
That scientifically prove that you was adjusting my seat.
translation.zh: 这就科学地证明你调了我的座位

translation.en: That's not science. It is. Now just let it go.
translation.zh:
-这不算科学
-当然算 别跟我争了

translation.en: It's not science. I said let it go.
translation.zh:
-这不算科学
-我叫你别跟我争

translation.en: I'm just... I said it was science, God damn it.
translation.zh:
-我只是说
-我说是科学 就是科学

translation.en: Why you think I want to sell Golden Wonton Restaurant?
translation.zh: 你凭什么想叫我卖馄饨馆？

translation.en: I got a good business.
It practically run itself. I make a lot of money here.
translation.zh: 管都不用管 能赚很多钱

translation.en: JACK: Every man got a price.
We think this might be yours.
translation.zh: 我们觉得这个应该是你要的价码

translation.en: And here is my counteroffer.
Excuse me. All right, it's go time.
translation.zh:
-对不起
-好了 好话说完了

translation.en: I not like rest of town people. I not intimidated by Latimore.
translation.zh:
我跟其他人不一样
我不怕你们拉提莫兄弟

translation.en: You wrong, Wong. Relax, man. Be cool with that thing, Mr. Wong.

-老王 你错了
-别用那玩意儿

translation.en: Ling Ling, get my pistol!
translation.zh: 玲玲 把我的枪拿来

translation.en: That dude is crazy. Let's get the hell out of here!
translation.zh: 这老东西疯了 赶快跑！

translation.en: I never sell to Latimore! Ever! Ever!
translation.zh:
我死也不卖给
拉提莫兄弟！死都不卖！

translation.en: (YELLS)
(DANCE MUSIC PLAYING) BUSTER: All right! Y'all ready, class? (WOMEN WHOOPING) Are y'all ready?

增加信心）

Hey, you get your skinny ass out of my way.
One, two, three, four. I stepped in poo, better wipe it off.

一 二 三 四 一脚踩上狗屎
赶快擦掉

translation.en: One, two, three, four. One, two, three, four.
translation.zh: 一 二 三 四

translation.en: I stepped in poo, better wipe it off. One, two, three, four.

踩上狗屎 赶快擦掉
一 二 三 四

translation.en: Ride the horse.
Ride the horse! (EXCLAIMS) Keep bucking, y'all!
translation.zh:
骑马 骑大马！ 快马加鞭！加速！
吼吼 快马加鞭！

快马加鞭！加速！

快马加鞭！加速！
吼吼 快马加鞭！ 踢踏舞！滑步！踢踏舞！

translation.en: Click clackety clack! Just slide!
Here come the cops. Here come the cops.
They take me to jail. They take me to jail.
translation.zh:
要抓我坐牢
要抓我坐牢哟！

translation.en: Riverdance. Come on, white people. Riverdance. Come on, white people.
Riverdance. Come on.

Pump, pump, pump, pump, pump me down.
And one, two, three, four, five, six,
seven, eight, nine, ten, eleven, twelve.

I think I need a little adjustment over here.
Look at you, looking like the Great Pumpkin, girl.
translation.zh: 看看你 简直像个大南瓜小姐

Well, see, I was born with a trick hip and it made me real bendy.

我这人生来臀部
就爱错位 骨头软

translation.en: See, I'm just like licorice. Look.
Goddamn, girl, that look like the harvest moon.
Turn a brother to a werewolf. (HOWLS SEDUCTIVELY) You just need to stop.
You know what? Do you do any private lessons?

你知道不？
你教不教一对一小班课？

translation.zh: 你要是能帮我个小忙我就教

很显然

Norbit.

你知道昨晚你让我

你还记得

男女亲嘴是好事

translation.en: Ling Ling. Come here with your fine self.
translation.zh: 玲玲 过来让我也亲亲

translation.en: I now pronounce you man and wife.
translation.zh: 我现在宣布你们为合法夫妻

translation.en: NORBIT: As for Rasputia and the rest of the Latimores,
we never heard from them again.
translation.zh: 我们再没有他们的消息

translation.en: Rumor has it they settled somewhere in Mexico and opened the club.
translation.zh:
谣传说他们在墨西哥落户
开夜总会

translation.en: (MARIACHI MUSIC PLAYING)
NORBIT: I guess they're living their dream, too.
translation.zh: 他们也算是梦想成真吧

translation.en: Say, man, don't you have any better-looking girls than that?
translation.zh:
我说 你有没有
漂亮一点的小姐？

translation.en: Our best girl's coming out right now.
translation.zh: 我们的大美人马上出台

translation.en: ANNOUNCER: Rasputia! (CROWD CHEERING)
Hold on, now, Pepe.
Ain't nothing going down there unless it got the word "peso" written on it.
(IN SPANISH) How you doin'?
